__e: Is Alison alive and back in her house?
Alison is still with us. With me. More than I want.
I blew up my life for you, Alison, and now here I am, wanting to leave with you, and you can't leave because you got a fucking yoga class?
Alison did the same thing to me.
Well, you say that, but secrets have a way of getting out. Like what Alison shared when she visited me at the hospital.
i mean... look, alison gave up a lot when she married you-- her friends, her job, her life in the city.
How did you feel when you found out Alison was still alive?
You knew Alison was alive for over a month - and you never said a word?
And when she heard Alison was alive and coming home, she panicked.
You want me to love you, but I love Alison, and that's the truth.
So are we really saying that Alison's "A" out loud?
So you're saying that Alison went there to kill Barnes, but she couldn't finish the job, so what, she called her brother?
This whole Alison thing has never made any sense to me.
I'm not a fan of Alison, but this isn't about me.
Alison never had anyone like you in her whole life.
Hey Alison I was wondering if you wanted to see a movie or have a meal.
Alison picked you because you care.
Look... Hey, Alison loved you. And I don't know if it was in the way that you wanted her to, but I know that she did.
